title: News24.com | Pandemic politics: Community health workers gear up to fight Covid-19 with little protection, and less pay
description: Around the world, SARS-CoV-2 has stopped everyday life dead in its tracks. The virus has also scratched open old wounds between the health department and community health workers, a cadre essential to the fight against the pandemic.
